archimate:Requirement.name: SG.1.1.5b: b) direct information security activities by communicating the organisation's risk appetite, endorsing the information security strategy and policy, and allocating sufficient resources to support them effectively
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
